description: An Italian doctor staying at the hotel, which has hundreds of guests, tested positive on Monday.
title: Coronavirus: Tenerife hotel with hundreds of guests locked down
title_page: Coronavirus: Tenerife hotel with hundreds of guests locked down - BBC News
maintext: He said: "The hotel has been cordoned off but we're trying to make the best of what's going on. We haven't been given any more information other than the note but we're going to just wait, try and enjoy the holiday and see what happens."
